long_description: Frontier Bites Crunchy Energizing Bites give you a delicious, healthy way to get energy when you're on the go. Bites are held together with honey and brown rice syrup, the perfect combination of glucose and polysaccharides that burn slowly and cleanly through your system. They're full of antioxidants and omega-3s and contain only pure, natural ingredients with nothing fortified or added to them. Frontier Bites Crunchy Energizing Bites are non-GMO and free of gluten, soy, dairy, preservatives, and refined sugars. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Frontier Bites Crunchy Energizing Bites give you a delicious, healthy way to get energy when you're on the go.
